deals.title: Pure Health Acai Bowl
deals.itemDescription:
Base: acai, banana, almond milk.

Toppings: sliced banana, hemp granola.

The Pure Health Acai Bowl is a blend of organic acai sourced from the amazon rainforest and blended with a touch of banana for a creamy base and topped with sliced banana and organic hemp granola.

deals.title: Blue Banana Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Blue spirulina, açai, banana, grass-fed whey protein, cashew butter, coconut butter, & almond milk.

The Blue Banana has a natural vibrant light blue color which comes from the blue spirulina and has a flavor profile with notes of vanilla ice cream but is made with all superfoods.

deals.title: Chicken Shawarma
deals.itemDescription: Immerse yourself in a culinary delight with our Chicken Shawarma – a taste sensation that transcends ordinary dining. Tender, marinated chicken, slow-roasted to perfection, creates a succulent masterpiece that's a symphony of flavors. Each bite unveils a harmony of spices, coupled with a medley of crisp vegetables, all embraced by a soft, warm flatbread.

deals.title: Lamb Shawarma
deals.itemDescription: Savor the bold and savory experience of our Beef Shawarma—a culinary masterpiece that captivates your palate. Succulent strips of marinated beef, seasoned to perfection, are slow-cooked and paired with crisp vegetables, all wrapped in a warm, fluffy flatbread. Elevate your taste journey with this robust and flavorful delight that promises a symphony of satisfaction in every bite.
